definitions: The act of placing a dead body in the ground or a tomb.
The act of covering something completely with a large amount of something else.
The act of putting something out of sight or hiding it.
The act of immersing oneself deeply in an activity or task.
examples: The family is burying their loved one tomorrow.
The snow is burying the car.
She is burying her face in her hands.
He is burying himself in his work.
